answerText: Cakes and Ale[10] This novel by the same author tells of the many relationships of its club-footed protagonist, Philip Carey, including ones with Miss Price and Sally Altheny.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 3 | 14 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: William Ashenden is the narrator of this story, and he is contacted for information for a biography in progress. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Mrs. Driffield commissions Alroy Kear to write a biography of the late Edward Driffield.
